import './Login.css' import React, { useState } from 'react' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import { useAuth } from '../../contexts/AuthContext' const LoginPage = () => { const { loginUser } = useAuth() const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const history = useHistory() const handleClick = async () => { try { await loginUser(email, password) history.push('/') } catch (err) { console.log(err) } } return (

facebook

) } export default LoginPage
